cn.trinea.android.common.util

类 PreferencesUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.trinea.android.common.util.PreferencesUtils

  • public class PreferencesUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    PreferencesUtils, easy to get or put data
      Preference Name
    • you can change preference name by PREFERENCE_NAME
      Put Value
    • put string putString(Context, String, String)
    • put int putInt(Context, String, int)
    • put long putLong(Context, String, long)
    • put float putFloat(Context, String, float)
    • put boolean putBoolean(Context, String, boolean)
      Get Value
    • get string getString(Context, String), getString(Context, String, String)
    • get int getInt(Context, String), getInt(Context, String, int)
    • get long getLong(Context, String), getLong(Context, String, long)
    • get float getFloat(Context, String), getFloat(Context, String, float)
    • get boolean getBoolean(Context, String), getBoolean(Context, String, boolean)
    作者:
    Trinea 2013-3-6

    • 方法详细资料

      • putString

        public static boolean putString(Context context,
                java.lang.String key,
                java.lang.String value)
        put string preferences
        参数:
        context -
        key - The name of the preference to modify
        value - The new value for the preference
        返回:
        True if the new values were successfully written to persistent storage.

      • getString

        public static java.lang.String getString(Context context,
                         java.lang.String key)
        get string preferences
        参数:
        context -
        key - The name of the preference to retrieve
        返回:
        The preference value if it exists, or null. Throws ClassCastException if there is a preference with this name that is not a string
        另请参阅:
        #getString(Context, String, String)}

      • getString

        public static java.lang.String getString(Context context,
                         java.lang.String key,
                         java.lang.String defaultValue)
        get string preferences
        参数:
        context -
        key - The name of the preference to retrieve
        defaultValue - Value to return if this preference does not exist
        返回:
        The preference value if it exists, or defValue. Throws ClassCastException if there is a preference with this name that is not a string

      • putInt

        public static boolean putInt(Context context,
             java.lang.String key,
             int value)
        put int preferences
        参数:
        context -
        key - The name of the preference to modify
        value - The new value for the preference
        返回:
        True if the new values were successfully written to persistent storage.

      • getInt

        public static int getInt(Context context,
         java.lang.String key)
        get int preferences
        参数:
        context -
        key - The name of the preference to retrieve
        返回:
        The preference value if it exists, or -1. Throws ClassCastException if there is a preference with this name that is not a int
        另请参阅:
        #getInt(Context, String, int)}

         java.lang.String key,
         int defaultValue)
        get int preferences
        参数:
        context -
        key - The name of the preference to retrieve
        defaultValue - Value to return if this preference does not exist
        返回:
        The preference value if it exists, or defValue. Throws ClassCastException if there is a preference with this name that is not a int

        key - The name of the preference to modify
        value - The new value for the preference
        返回:

      • getBoolean

        public static boolean getBoolean(Context context,
                 java.lang.String key)
        get boolean preferences, default is false
        参数:
        context -
        key - The name of the preference to retrieve
        返回:
        The preference value if it exists, or false. Throws ClassCastException if there is a preference with this name that is not a boolean
        另请参阅:
        #getBoolean(Context, String, boolean)}

      • getBoolean

        public static boolean getBoolean(Context context,
                 java.lang.String key,
                 boolean defaultValue)
        get boolean preferences
        参数:
        context -
        key - The name of the preference to retrieve
        defaultValue - Value to return if this preference does not exist
        返回:
        The preference value if it exists, or defValue. Throws ClassCastException if there is a preference with this name that is not a boolean
